thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Colleen Walsh

author: Colleen Walsh
title: Colleen Walsh
text: I have placed about 5 orders for our office through ezCater so far and I could not be happier that I found them. Everything I've ordered has arrived on time, and has been delicious. The staff loves the variety that we now have for our weekly meetings. So many different choices and options, and price ranges. I will definitely be using ezCater for upcoming holiday office parties, and any other meetings we have in the future. Highly recommend them!!
